description: Roasted red pepper halves are stuffed with a rich vegan risotto studded with bits of sun-dried tomatoes, asparagus, and creamied up with blended raw cashews.
name: Creamy Vegan Risotto Stuffed Peppers with Asparagus and Sun-Dried Tomatoes
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup raw cashews (soaked in water 4-8 hours and drained)
1/2 cup oil packed sun-dried tomatoes (drained and finely chopped)
12 medium asparagus spears (trimmed and cut into 1 inch pieces)

recipeInstructions.text: Slice peppers in half and scoop out seeds. Rub lightly with olive oil and place on baking sheet, cut sides down. Bake until tender and lightly browned in spots, about 20 minutes.
